Text:
I have one table has Salary has 3 rows and i want to get maximum value from this table wihout using Max,Min or order by clause.
Data 

Salary has three fields - ID,Name,Amount
value of Amount - 100,70,80,400,300

I need to get value of 400 from this data.

I know Select max(Amount) from Salary, But i need without max,min or Order by clause.

Thanks in advance.
